title: Pixel 6 Pro long term review: Managing the unbearable weight of expectation [Video]
content:
It’s hard to believe that the first all-Google phones are now six months old. The launch of the Pixel 6 Pro was an exciting time but the interim period has not been quite so kind to Google’s latest flagship. Let’s examine just how well it has aged and if things have improved.

more…

The post Pixel 6 Pro long term review: Managing the unbearable weight of expectation [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The hype ahead of the Pixel 6 Pro release was incredible and in most regards the flagship lived up to expectations, but what about in 2022?
